I have recently picked up this game for $1.00 and can already tell that it's one of the best of our time.

This game has a good story, and great humor. However, where this game REALLY shines is in the co-op, and the workshop support. I've put in more hours in co-op chambers off the workshop with a buddy of mine than I can remember. Countless hours of fun, and plenty more in store for me!

I've played for 57 hours recorded, but probably 3X that. Been through the whole thing at least 4 times. That's not trying to blaze though it, that's not even playing immediate attention to what I need to do next at any time. This is the result of deeply enjoying a very fun and detailed environment. And yes, some levels did take me a long time, with some inevitable facepalm when I finally noticed what was right before me. But what a delight in suddenly seeing the way through that you know is there, if you can just look at it differently.   Plus the background story is just so entertaining. Being a Boomer, ya gotta know this hits me where I live. If you're like, "Huh?" Imagine that Tony Stark's dad is the one that set all this up. That it is a subdivision of Stark Enterprises of the 50s and 60s. Then you'll see it.

да, игра прикольная. проходили вдвоём, нам зашло. потом через пару месяцев додумались зайти на отдельный режим и спидранить комнаты на скорость, получили пару достижений. мало того, одиночная сюжетка тоже очень прикольная. по крайней мере дольше чем первая часть которую я прошёл часа за два)))

Eins der humorvollsten und aufwendigsten Puzzlespiele, das ich je gespielt habe. Liebevoll gemacht, verrückte und gute Story, abgerundet mit verdammt geilen leveln und jede menge kleiner, völlig absurder Secrets ( Ein Achievment für den Freitod beispielsweise :P )
Erfordert nebenbei auch noch viel "Out of the box" denken und alleine die mechanik des portale platzierens macht das spiel ziemlich beeindruckend für mich (immer noch keinen plan wie so etwas überhaupt funktioniert)
Das offline und das online spiel ist einfach geil und macht viel spaß

Одна из лучших игр Valve, её можно приравнять к Half-life. Довольно интересный и запутанный сюжет,хорошо проработанные комнаты испытаний с различными головоломками и плюс к всему этому кооперативный режим для игры с друзьями позволяющий играть как на официальных карта, так и на тех что делают игроки. Не можете найти хорошую карту или хотите заставить своего друга помучатся? Тогда вам во встроенный редактор карт как для одиночного, так и кооперативного прохождения. Игра стоит своих денег и времени что вы на нее потратите. Берите - не пожалеете.
IL est bon comme ta maman

I don't think I need to explain why everyone should play this game... 

10/10.

Fantastic game, couldn't recommend more, but some chapters do drag on a bit, but if you're getting bored, there's probably a quip or great line around the corner to make you laugh. As usual, it has the trademark Valve humor, and the voice acting is fantastic. Overall I'd say 9.5/10 due to great story, visuals, humor, voice acting, creative puzzles and infinite content due to the test chamber builder and community content, but it does have some (albeit minor) flaws.

Portal 2 continuou o reinado de Portal de forma brilhante, continuando a ser um dos poucos jogos que eu poderia recomendar pra qualquer pessoa.

Recomendo a quem nunca jogou nenhum portal a jogar o primeiro título, que também é excelente e vai te colocar por dentro da história. Apesar disso, portal 2 pode ser jogado normalmente sem que haja nenhuma dificuldade de entendimento do enredo. Por isso, jogar o primeiro título é apenas uma "recomendação", mas que ainda sim acrescenta muito à experiência do jogador.

Apesar mecânica de portais (que é a base do jogo e o torna tão incrível) continua e é expandida! Entre as novas e variadas mecânicas, a que mais se destaca acredito ser a mecânica dos géis (branco, azul e alaranjado), sendo que no alaranjado o jogador pode correr a uma super velocidade, no azul o jogador tem um super pulo, e no branco é possível criar portais.

Dessa vez vemos um desenrolar da história no centro de pesquisa científica onde os experimentos são conduzidos.

A narrativa está ainda mais hilária e descontraída, além de conter várias reviravoltas! Novamente, vale muito a pena!

Dito isso, tenho a dizer que minha experiência com o jogo foi incrível, já que conseguiram melhorar ainda mais o jogo. Merecidamente, nota 9,6.
